title: Game crashes several times and I get Leaver Buster because of it?!

replies.body:
It definitely sounds like there's something up with your network settings or path to the servers since you're seeing network connectivity error messages and having issues connecting to matches. While I cannot remove your Leaverbuster penalty, as we're locked out of making changes to prevent any sort of abuse, I **can** assist in troubleshooting and resolving this issue.

Because different servers and services you access are located in different geolocations, there could be issues reaching our servers while no issues reaching another service like Google or YouTube. I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to verify all your local configurations are good before we investigate further. I'd recommend testing any changes in a custom match alone to prevent any further penalties.

Let me know if you still experience these disconnections after taking those steps.

This morning I made a custom game in hopes that the servers weren't messing up again - and to my surprise I was able to get into a custom game. After that I decided to take a risk and try to play a coop vs AI game -- and it worked. I continued to play coop vs ai until leaver buster was finally over. If it was bad luck or something else I don't know, but I do know that its over. If it ever happens to me again I'll be sure to check the connection guide and alert you all if it happens again and the guide doesn't help. Thank you.
